Text: Someone is trying to be an SEO whore, or someone is trying to track you, dear torrent downloader.  In the .doc file is a link.  In the link is a referral ID.  If you are intending to visit the silly site in the .doc file that has you download potential shit, tracker software, or worse, please remove the referral link.  After all, I'm sure Mr. ward1095 meant to give this upload for free and not make any cash from it, yes?
